name: Tampere's outbreak
description:
Turn based RPG about the combat against COVID in the city of Tampere.

A game in which players move towards landmarks in Tampere, in order to engage in combat against a variety of monsters. This is a mock-up, the map zone represents a player walking around Tampere.  

  • 5G could benefit the intended real time geolocation feature.
  • 5G could benefit interaction with different players in new game modes.
  • Level up function not implemented. 
  • Complex animations done but not implemented.
  • As a possibility for monetization, a store with new outfits and power-ups.
  • Directed by Miguel Fernandez
  • Art by Adela Jose Roig
